data.name: Inner Tour
data.destination: Enter 4 different flyby Spaces in the same Turn.
data.fulfilledAbility: when entering Aerobrake Hazards leading to LEO.
data.flavorText: Using flybys, it is possible to see a great deal of the inner system in a short period of time.

data.name: Grand Tour
data.destination: Enter 2 flyby Spaces beyond Ceres zone in the same Turn.
data.flavorText: The Grand Tour was the mission of Voyager 2 visiting the giant planets using slingshots.

data.name: Vanity Project
data.destination: Enter any Inner Moon or Helion Return (7G/0G).
data.flavorText: The very silly, especially a very rich silly, like to fly in the face of danger.

data.name: Extreme Sports
data.destination: Enter any Moon in a hazard zone with a Torch Engine and 3 G-hours of burns in the same Turn.
data.flavorText: The very geeky and very rich are willing to pay big bucks for playing ships on dangerous fly-bys.

data.name: Fugitive
data.destination: Enter any ET Colony when your Faction suffers Anarchy.
data.flavorText: Independent digital colonies allow a person's consciousness to exist and be propagated despite poor local governance.

data.name: Refugees
data.destination: When Fulfilling, must suffer Anarchy.
data.flavorText: Humanitarian groups are willing to pay top dollar to save people not served by the current governance system.

data.name: Chiron Quest
data.destination: Enter Chiron (15.5-18.5).
data.flavorText: Named after a gentle centaur in Greek mythology, Chiron circles between Saturn and Uranus and is potentially covered with tarry hydrocarbons.

data.name: Cen Tour
data.destination: Enter any Helion Moon (10.0-19.9).
data.flavorText: Chiron is a comet also classified as a Centaur, for its halfway distance between Jupiter and Neptune.

data.name: Hubris
data.destination: Enter any underfed Bernal.
data.flavorText: Although humans have successfully manufactured an environment where one can live in space, arrogance and overconfidence could result in catastrophic system failure.

data.name: Fulgurite Hunt
data.destination: Enter any Site, Prospect or Factory (>=50 mbar).
data.flavorText: Obsessed traveler is willing to pay top dollar to acquire pieces of glass forged by lightning strikes.

data.name: Comet Adventure
data.destination: Enter any Synodic 3ax.
data.flavorText: The highly textured world, looking more like a loose collection of rocks than a single coherent rock, has much popular to the fringe communities.

data.name: Pleasure Garden
data.destination: Enter any Site beyond Ceres zone.
data.flavorText: Pornography exists, but mostly in virtual space and is big business. Outer sites that create real porn can make good revenue at the right buyers.

data.name: Robotic Facility
data.destination: Enter any Bernal (<=5.7G).
data.flavorText: The space environment is ideal for complex robots. Vacuum keeps them clean and slow spin keeps the facility organized.

data.name: Goo Spores
data.destination: When Fulfilling, must dismantle a bug.
data.flavorText: A gray-goo catastrophe just occurred, and gray-goo spores were ejected beyond the solar system, leaving more spores for research.

data.name: Artemis
data.destination: Enter any Ice-Water Moon (<=5.7G).
data.fulfilledAbility: You may prospect Luna without performing a boost for 1st player.
data.flavorText: Artemis was the goddess of wild animals and hunt and was often identified with the moon. Her legacy continues in modern times through NASA's project.

data.name: HAVOC
data.destination: Enter any Ice or Water Moon (7.00-9.99).
data.flavorText: HAVOC was designed by NASA's Langley Research Center, using dirigibles in Venus's atmosphere where pressure and temperature are more Earth-like.

data.name: New Horizons
data.destination: Enter any Kuiper Belt Z-axis (KBO 19.5-48.6).
data.flavorText: The famous New Horizons probe traveled 9 years without stopping. This mission goes to Kuiper Belt at a leisure pace and pays for those that visit.

data.name: Home on Lagrange
data.destination: Your Anchored Bernal not in Venus/Earth/Mars zones.
data.flavorText: The artificial gravity and cave-like surface of a rotating space station are the best conditions of a safe area to live in space and give birth to children.

data.name: Mars Polar Walk
data.destination: Enter North or South Axial Return (7.5-8.0).
data.flavorText: The North polar ice of Mars extends down to about 45 degrees and is about 2 km. Axial Returns can reach for either pole.

data.name: ET Holy Grail
data.destination: Enter any ET when unexplored.
data.flavorText: Be the first agent to go where no one has explored before.

data.name: Closest Planet
data.destination: Enter any Moon (0.3-0.4500).
data.flavorText: Settled in the closest planet from the Sun, Mercury is slightly larger than our Moon. It has both the densest and hottest rocks in the Solar System.

data.name: Highest Cliff
data.destination: Enter any Moon (19.0-19.5).
data.flavorText: The Verona Rupes on Miranda in the Uranus system is the tallest cliff in the solar system. The 20 km cliff offers one of the best bungee jumping and climbing opportunities.

data.name: Fool's Gold
data.destination: Enter any Synodic Site (10.0- Return).
data.flavorText: A failure in communications makes a trillionaire believe there is a secret motherlode at a comet rendezvous.

data.name: Rivalry
data.destination: Highest Glory chits in hand (of any player).
data.fulfilledAbility: Gain 1 additional Aqua when fulfilling Contracts.
data.flavorText: The celebrity factor of glory chits is enough to satiate this trillionaire with no shortage of money.
